question: Which country's post-war recovery project was "Wefri Warsay Yika'alo (WWY) Programme"?
explanation: Wefri Warsay Yika'alo (WWY) Programme is a post-war recovery project of Eritrea. It is a form of economic recovery programme of Eritrea. The program is a series of sponsored investments managed by the Eritrean government in economic, education, health and transportation-related infrastructure. These investments are typically made by a mixture of grants and loans from international organizations and from the Government of Eritrea. The transfer of skills is an important component of this program.
